name: Black n' White (imakestuffkid)
description:
Two bland colors, one hard game.

Use the buttons or arrow keys to fly through the course. Press the quit button or Q to quit back to the menu. Do not run out of energy or time! Press skip or 0 to skip a song.

All music by FesliyanStudios, art by me, code by me.

Black n' White 2 in the works :)
